content: this is my simple all in one elephant pattern it is designed to be worked in one piece without having to join on any other parts it takes about 30 minutes to complete one elephant and uses approx 20 metres 22 yards of yarn each with a 3 5mm hook the measure about 13cm long and 5cm high any size yarn and hook can be used great project to use up your scrap balls of yarn too please see my other all in one patterns
